程序包 com.oligei.ticketgathering.dao

接口 UserDao

所有已知实现类:
UserDaoImpl
public interface UserDao

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    boolean existsByUsername​(java.lang.String username)
    check whether the user is existed
    User findUserByUserId​(java.lang.Integer userId)
    get userInfo by userId
    User login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
    check username and password
    boolean register​(User user)
    decode password, save the user information in mongodb and mysql
    User save​(User user)
    save a user to increment or decrement balance
